techmeme.title: Asana unveils "AI teammates", a new feature in beta for select customers to help manage projects and tasks, ahead of general availability later in 2024 (Harry McCracken/Fast Company)
The UK's Competition Appeal Tribunal rules that a class action lawsuit against Google over allegations of abusing its dominance in digital ads can proceed (Upmanyu Trivedi/Bloomberg)
Tobiko, which offers a dbt-compatible data transformation service to help teams manage data, raised a $4.5M seed and $17.3M Series A led by Theory Ventures (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
Sixteen Republican lawmakers accuse Nigeria of taking Binance executive Tigran Gambaryan "hostage" and urge Biden to help secure his release in a June 4 letter (Nduka Orjinmo/Bloomberg)
ASML CFO Roger Dassen says TSMC, Intel, and Samsung will all get its €350M high-NA EUV machines by the end of 2024; the machines can print 8nm lines on chips (Cagan Koc/Bloomberg)
